name: Drift Racing (itch)
description:
Drift around the track in different cars

Controls

WASD for dirving (Like most pc games)

Page up and Page down to swap cars.

Space for handbrake.

(You can also you a xbox 360 controller left joystick to turn Right trigger to go. Left trigger to back up. And A to use handbrake)

This is a windows only game...

Made with unity 3d
